title: Microcosm: The Quantum Revolution In Economics And Technology
description: From Simon & Schuster, Microcosm is the provocative national bestseller by the author of Wealth and Poverty .George Gilder's Microcosm is the crystal ball of the next technological era. Leading scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs provide vivid accounts of the latest inventions, revealing how the new international balance of power really lies in information technology.
author: George Gilder
